articles.title: French regulators say iPhone 12 emits too much radiation, Apple must take it off market - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: French regulators have ordered Apple to stop selling the iPhone 12, saying it emits electromagnetic radiation levels that are above European Union standards for exposure.
articles.content: PARIS (AP) French regulators ordered Apple to stop selling the iPhone 12, saying it emits electromagnetic radiation levels that are above European Union standards for exposure. The company disputed t… [+4160 chars]
